import React, { memo } from 'react' import styles from './index.module.css' import formatDistanceToNowStrict from 'date-fns/formatDistanceToNowStrict' import Photo from '../photo' import * as ICON from '../icons' import IconButton from '../icon-button' import {useEffect,useState} from 'react' function StructureTweet({name,mention,date,children,big}) { const [tampon,setTampon]=useState(true) const [newText,setNewText]=useState([]) const untilNow = formatDistanceToNowStrict(date) var gelen=[] var text=[] useEffect(()=> { setTimeout(setTampon(false),1500) // setNewText([sessionStorage.getItem('TEXT')]) var gelen=[] var text=[] gelen=JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('TEXT')) console.log('GELEN',gelen); gelen.forEach((e,i)=> text[i]=e) console.log('TEXT', text); },[]) return (!tampon && text.map((tweet)=> { console.log('TWEET', tweet); return (
{/* BAŞLA */}
{name} @{mention} • {untilNow}

{tweet}

5
12
{/* BİTİR */}
) } )) } export default StructureTweet
